requirements.summary: Document a production release procedure that deploys the current draft build without changing app behavior or configuration.
acceptanceCriteria: A production deployment is triggered from the current draft build.
After deployment completes, the production app is accessible and reflects the same behavior/content as the latest draft.

file_operations.description: Add English-only release documentation describing how to trigger a production deployment from the current draft build using the existing project deployment tooling/pipeline (without modifying application code, Stripe configuration, authentication, or pricing logic), plus a short verification checklist to confirm production matches the latest draft behavior/content.
